reference.title: cxxTypedefDeclarationFile
reference.shortdesc: Specifies the source code file containing the typedef.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxTypedefDeclarationFile> element is defined within <cxxTypedefAPIItemLocation>. <cxxTypedefDeclarationFile> has no content apart from the required attributes name and value. name is always "filePath" and value indentifies the file containing the typedef.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <cxxTypedefAPIItemLocation> <cxxTypedefDeclarationFile name="filePath" value="D:/src/include/headerfile.h"/> <cxxTypedefDeclarationFileLine name="lineNumber" value="775"/> <cxxTypedefDefinitionFile name="filePath" value="D:/src/include/headerfile.h"/> </cxxTypedefAPIItemLocation>
